title: もぐもぐダイエット
shortDescription: Slow down, eat mindfully, stay healthy!
longDescription1: Designed to help you overcome fast eating habits. By encouraging you to chew each bite at least
longDescription2: times and extend meals to a minimum of
longDescription3: minutes, it helps prevent overeating and supports weight loss.
encourage:
